CytoDefiningCriteria: wide and lightly stained layer 3 and poorly developed layer 4
along with a poorly defined border between layers 5 and 6 (see fig 3
5 and 7).  An anterior and posterior part were distinguished based on layer 4
ChemoDefiningCriteria: Slightly higher density of parvalbumin+ cells and neuropil in the anterior portion compared to the adjacent parasubiculum
but lower compared to area 29i and to the posterior portion of the parastriate area.  The difference between the parastriate area and area 18 is most clearly defined in SMI-32 stained sections
Area prostriata of DMVH2003.Definition: Cytoarchitecturally defined region within the isthmus of the cingulate cortex located posterior to the parasubiculum of the isthmus, bordering area 17 posteriorly, further divided into an anterior and posterior portion based on cytoarchitectureal and immunocytochemical criteria
